snippet: The fast-food chain said it would mix Mountain Dew with orange juice to create a breakfast drink.
abstract: Taco Bell will add Mtn Dew AM, a mix of Mountain Dew soda and Tropicana orange juice, to its breakfast menu.
lead_paragraph: The fast-food chain said it would mix Mountain Dew with orange juice to create a breakfast drink.

headline.main: Soda Beverage for Breakfast at Taco Bell
headline.print_headline: Soda Beverage For Breakfast at Taco Bell
